headline.main: The Offensive in Egypt Develops; The British Eighth Army Shows Superiority of Weight In Preliminary Task of Reducing Enemy's Strong Points

lead_paragraph: In Egypt, grappling armies swayed slowly over the desert battlefield yesterday as the British continued the tedious and costly process of reducing enemy strong points and clearing minefields and obstructions.

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: MEDITERRANEAN, AFRICAN, BALKAN AND NEAR EAST FRONT
